text: The Official Museums of Amsterdam (OAM) is an organization of museums in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 1994. All member museums belong to the Dutch museum association. ==Members== The current list of the 44 members: * Allard Pierson Museum * Amsterdam Museum * Anne Frank House * de Appel * ARCAM * Artis * Biblical Museum/Cromhout houses * Special collections * Cobra Museum * Eye * FOAM * Museum Geelvinck-Hinlopen * Hermitage Amsterdam * National Holocaust Memorial * Hortus Botanicus Amsterdam * Huis Marseille * Huis met de Hoofden * Jewish Historical Museum * JHM Children museum * Portugees-IsraÃ«lietische Synagoge * Klederdracht museum * Amsterdam Castle * NEMO * Nieuwe Kerk * Oude Kerk * Outsider Museum * Ons' Lieve Heer op Solder * Multatuli Museum * Dutch Press museum * Rembrandt House Museum * Royal Palace of Amsterdam * Pijpenkabinet & Smokiana * Rijksmuseum Amsterdam * The Dutch Maritime Museum * Museum Het Schip * Amsterdam City Archives * Stedelijk Museum * Museum of Bags and Purses * Museum of the Tropics * Van Gogh Museum * Dutch Funeral Museum * Micropia * Museum Van Loon * Dutch Resistance museum * Museum Willet-Holthuysen * Diamond Museum Amsterdam == References == ==Other websites== * Official website OAM * Official website Dutch museum association Category:Museums in the Netherlands Category:Organizations based in Amsterdam Category:1994 establishments in the Netherlands
title: Official Museums of Amsterdam
